attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Dewsbury, west yorkshire has undergone an unprecedented amount of social and economic decline over the past 15 years.
The recession has now exacerbated this.local people feel cut off, disillusioned, hopeless and unfair treated in the region.

rejection.details: We suggest you contact your local authority in the first instance. However, should you wish to resubmit your petition, it may help if you are more specific about what action you would like the government to take.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
